basic.description: This laboratory supports EEL 3003 and must be taken concurrently with first enrollment in EEL 3003. Must be dropped if EEL 3003 is dropped.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: Introduction to Electrical Engineering Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 2312 and PHY 2049C. Corequisite: EEL 3003.
